content.task: Test multi-agent system connectivity and provide status report on why the agent system shows as 'stopped' while agents are being initialized correctly
content.context: The multi-agent system startup script reports agents initialized successfully but system status remains 'stopped'. All 8 agents are in 'initializing' state. This is preventing engagement of specialized agents for CI/CD tasks.
